name: places/ChIJk6nCQZdZwokRdXFqFUb11ys
adrFormatAddress: 30 5th Ave #1D, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text:
I quickly learned how fortunate I am to have Dr Adarsh Vijay Mudgil as my dermatologist. He is a truly, caring, talented, friendly and professional dermatologist.
I had a terrible experience at a different dermatology office where the other Dr told me the procedure she said I needed was not included in my insurance plan and had me pay $1,500.00 for a procedure that didn't work at all.
I went to Dr Mudgil, who explained that the procedure the other Dr did was useless and not necessary. He said it was a natural change and nothing could be done to correct it. He said "nobody notices this but you." He is right. No one had, or does notice and his reassurance made me feel much better about it. He said there are procedures that may reduce it slightly but he felt it should be left as is, as it's not noticeable or deforming in any way. That's the dermatologist I want to keep as my Doctor. An honest, sincere, brilliant professional dermatologist.
Dr Mudgil is the best! Any issues I have had when seeing him have always been addressed. I'll never see any other dermatologist other than Dr Mudgil.

originalText.text: Dr. Mudgil is great.  Quick and to-the point.  My appointment was at 9:45 AM on Friday.  I came late at 9:55 AM, sat for about ten minutes - then I was called to sit in the room.

text.text: Dr. Mudgil is great.  Quick and to-the point.  My appointment was at 9:45 AM on Friday.  I came late at 9:55 AM, sat for about ten minutes - then I was called to sit in the room.

originalText.text: Over the top great! Dr. Adarsh  Mudgil is the most skillful, kindest, thoughtful, caring, and personable dermatologist I have ever been to in many years. I'm vey happy to have found him and I recommend him highly.

text.text: Over the top great! Dr. Adarsh  Mudgil is the most skillful, kindest, thoughtful, caring, and personable dermatologist I have ever been to in many years. I'm vey happy to have found him and I recommend him highly.

originalText.text: I went to the doctors Manhattan office today  to be treated for a condition and from the receptionist, the pa, and the doctor  everything was a pleasant and efficient experience. The doctor is caring and knowledgeable. I’ve only completed part 1 of my treatment but I’ve found the right dermatologist.
